## Source: ossf-package-analysis (84e219b464ca71a3a879c1ee7bdfd597e739bae7939910d47b1300eb5083baf3)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'v0-components' @ 999.999.5001 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
